name: infxrrnmptcl
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cxr))
-| wi(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr))

stmt.origin: rnmptssd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cxr, c0, c1, w0)
stmt.pretty: rnmptssd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cxr, c0, c1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
-| diffsc(s0, cxr)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cxr))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
-| diffsc(s0, cxr)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

body.origin: |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cxr))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
-| diffsc(s0, cxr)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wi(w0, wcel(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cxr, clt), cxr))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cxr))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: The infimum of an arbitrary indexed set of extended reals is an extended real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
